biography: Teresea Melendez is an actress based out of Utah. She was born in Fort Sill, Oklahoma on November 14, 1970. She began taking piano lessons at the age of four. She majored in piano and vocal performance at Cameron University in Lawton, Oklahoma. She has been teaching private piano and vocal lessons for the last 27 years but has recently found a love for film.
name: Teresea Melendez
